report.title: Report message
report.subtitle: Share suspicious message anonymous so the shield go strong dey protect you.

placeholders.message: Paste or describe the suspicious message here...
placeholders.comment: Add context, e.g. why it looks risky.

status.heading: Report status
status.idle: Queued reports send automatically when a secure connection is available.
status.success: Report queued successfully. Thanks for training the shield!

validation.messageRequired: Add the suspicious message so we know what to review.

disabled.title: Manual reporting disabled
disabled.body: Turn on manual reports in Settings → Data & telemetry to send suspicious messages.

report.loadingBody: We're still loading your reporting preferences. Try again in a moment.

expoGoNotice.title: Expo Go limitation
expoGoNotice.body: Background scan dey pause for Expo Go. Build dev client or standalone app make the shield dey active even when app close.

permissionsReminder.title: Turn on needed access
permissionsReminder.body: On notifications and SMS make the shield fit scan automatically.

messagesScanned.title: How scanning dey work
messagesScanned.body: Any message wey land go dey check for your device immediately. We join sample data plus your mock runs make you see how busy the shield be.

threatsBlocked.title: About threats we block
threatsBlocked.body: Once message look risky—whether na from old samples or your simulation—we go flag am. Use am measure how many phishing attempt we dey catch.

safeMessages.title: Understand safe messages
safeMessages.body: Safe count dey estimate how many message pass inspection. We subtract suspicious ones from all we scan so you fit know when inbox clear.

mockDetection.title: Run sample scan
mockDetection.subtitle: Trigger background scanner with sample message make you preview alert.
mockDetection.helper: If sample threat show, we go display the details here plus send you local notification.
mockDetection.successBody: Check your notification shade make you see how alert go look real life.
mockDetection.noThreatBody: All sample message look safe this round. Try again later!
mockDetection.errorBody: We no fit run mock detector now. Close app, open am again, then retry.
mockDetection.noResultPlaceholder: Run the simulator make you see exactly how alerts go look inside app.
mockDetection.noMatches: No specific phishing pattern match but message still show risk.
mockDetection.safePreviewSubtitle: See as scanner dey treat message wey look legit.
mockDetection.safeSampleUnavailableBody: We never see low-risk sample right now. Run another mock scan.
mockDetection.clearedBody: We don reset the mock detection card.

settings.title: Open settings

onboarding.title: Activate your AI Phishing Shield
onboarding.subtitle: Take small tour make you sabi wetin we dey do and why we need permissions.

skipDialog.title: You wan skip the important permissions?
skipDialog.body: If notifications and SMS no dey on, the shield no fit catch scammers by itself. You fit turn am on later for settings.

onboarding.permissionNoteBody: Immediately after this tour you go grant notification and SMS access.

permissions.title: Keep the shield awake
permissions.subtitle: On these permissions make we fit scan message once e land.

notifications.title: Notification access

sms.title: SMS access

slides.title: Stay ahead of scammers
slides.description: We dey analyze SMS and notifications for your device to catch phishing instantly.

slides.title: Your privacy matter
slides.description: Everything dey happen offline. Messages no dey comot your phone and we no dey store your data.

slides.title: Give the correct access
slides.description: We go ask for SMS and notification permissions make we fit protect you quietly for background.

permissions.title: Notification access
permissions.description: So we fit scan WhatsApp, Messenger, Gmail and others instantly.

permissions.title: SMS read access
permissions.description: We need am to catch suspicious text message as dem land.
